name: Frisbee Chronicles
description:
Chapter 1

Discover the secrets of the legendary frisbee and the secret organization that is looking for it.

Frisbee chronicles is an action game where you have to fight the evil corporation, the J ellyfishers with your frisbee. Also you have to move through a city climbing buildings and jumping between them.


Controls

  • Press ESC to pause the game and see all the controls
  • WASD/Arrows to Move
  • Space Jump Climb
  • Q Dash
  • Shift Walk
  • Left click Charge and throw frisbee
  • Right click Throw frisbee forward
  • E Come off on climbing

Developers

Mario Alberto Segura Oliva
Alberto Casado Garfia
